title: STUDIO/APARTMENT IN PORT COSTA
neighborhood: hercules, pinole, san pablo, el sob
map_address: Prospect Avenue near Canyon Lake Drive
posting_body: Separate beautiful solid wood kitchen with gas appliances plus large living/bedroom with a couch, ottoman, bed, table and chairs, desk, shower, separate toilet and large walk-in closet.

The studio/apartment has it's own entrance on the bottom floor of a Victorian house and is totally separate from the main house that overlooks the Carquinez Straits, so you will have a wonderful view.
This unit is for one person only and the rent of $1700 a month includes all utilities and wireless internet.
It is available September 1 and a long-term lease is preferable.
References required with first and last month's rent.
anytime to make an appointment if you would like to view this wonderful living space in the scenic quiet town of Port Costa.
